metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6004 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
The compile_bracket_matchingpath function in pcre_jit_compile.c in PCREthrough 8.x before revision 1680 (e.g., the PHP 7.1.1 bundled version)allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds readand application crash) via a crafted regular expression.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6004` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpcre16-3 - 2:8.39-3
libpcre3 - 2:8.39-3
libpcre32-3 - 2:8.39-3
libpcrecpp0v5 - 2:8.39-3
pcregrep - 2:8.39-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pcre3 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:8.39-3').
